Package com.bandyer.core_av.capturer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Capturer
    A capturer is a representation of what(device audio/camera/screen) can be used to publish in the room
    CapturerObserver
    Capturer observer
    CapturerOptions
    Interface representing the options with which we want to create the capturer
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CapturerAudioOptions
    Audio capturing options
    CapturerCameraOptions
    VideoCamera capturing options
    CapturerScreenOptions
    ScreenShare capturing options
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CapturerState
    Capturer states
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CapturerException
    Capturer exception
    CapturerFreezeException
    Capturer is frozen exception
    CapturerStartException
    Capturer has failed to start exception
